title: Understanding the Epistemological Perspectives of Learning and Curriculum Designers: Constructivist-Based Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of curriculum design and educational experience in social studies
context.additional_context: A program for in-service professionals to expand epistemological perspectives through the analysis of constructivist theory and practical application cases.

learning_goals: Critically analyze a curriculum design framework based on constructivist learning theory.
Establish strategies for flexibly applying epistemological perspectives to solve problems occurring in real educational settings.
Propose a curriculum design incorporating social contexts by integrating various learning theories.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
